title: Sense of relief for business owners following Chinatown power outage | Crime | kitv.com
text: Sense of relief for business owners following Chinatown power outage - - Updated [0](https://www.kitv.com/video/crime/sense-of-relief-for-business-owners-following-chinatown-power-outage/video_fcfa61c0-3579-59d8-954c-f0885385b53a.html#comments) Chinatown's revitalization includes affordable housing, power restoration, and community events to support local businesses and boost safety and activity. As featured on As improvements continue, many local residents are encouraged by the revitalization efforts in Chinatown.
